alert.note: Alert for Hocking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 10:26PM EDT until July 24 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Hocking County in central Ohio... * Until 1100 PM EDT. * At 1026 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hocking Hills State Park, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Hocking Hills State Park, Starr and Ilesboro. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
